document.full_text: to keep the hits rolling, zynga is releasing a game in which  players build island nations and team up with friends to fend off attacks from intruders.
document.title: the latest from farmville's creator: empire and allies
lines_and_colors: to keep the hits rolling, zynga is releasing a game in which  players build island nations and team up with friends to fend off attacks from intruders.
